pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create and Evaluate NONMEM Models in a Project Context // Systematically creates and modifies NONMEM(R) control streams. Harvests NONMEM output, builds run logs, creates derivative data, generates diagnostics. NONMEM (ICON Development Solutions http://www.iconplc.com/) is software for nonlinear mixed effects modeling. See 'package?nonmemica'.
